analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassana ttika sa paccaya duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭigho appaccayo dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭighaḥ appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na sanidassana sappaṭighassa na appaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi upanissaye tīṇi saṅkhitta
